user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (feedback@medtechsolutions.com) with her thoughts on the patient profile management system, and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Your Feedback on the Patient-Profile Management System

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send your thoughts on the patient-profile management system to feedback@medtechsolutions.com? Your feedback is invaluable to us as we continue to improve the platform.

If you need to reference any prior notes or details, feel free to check your Gmail and Notion workspace.

Thank you very much for your time and insights!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
MedTech Solutions
